THE JUNGLE - Premiere Friday, Aug. 17

Frozen out of the Klondike, Todd Hoffman gets a hot tip on a gold claim in Guyana, South America. But to get there he must lead his crew through the snake-infested jungle, dangerous business deals and up deadly rivers in a "no guts, no glory" adventure.

looks like its a one off for South Am.. as says special

so its a preseason special

SPECIAL EPISODE FRI, AUG 17, AT 9 PM E/P!

In the face of the economic meltdown, determined men risk everything to strike it rich mining for gold in the wilds of the far north. Todd and Jack Hoffman, the Schnabel family and the Dakota Boys are all in search of the American dream and a new frontier.
